title: Goodyear Blimp is now a $150 a night Airbnb which comes with a 'football lounge'
text:
Advertisement

College football fans wondering what it's like to float inside the legendary Goodyear Blimp will finally get the chance stay inside the game day classic.

Beginning October 15, up to two guests can make a reservation on Airbnb to spend one night in the iconic blimp for $150.

This latest team up between Goodyear Blimp and Airbnb is meant to honor the 150th anniversary of college football.

The signature blimp is also being inducted into the College Football Hall of Fame as a honorary member, becoming the first non-player or coach to be given recognition.

Goodyear Blimp (pictured) and Airbnb have partnered up to let a few lucky college football fans spend one night inside the iconic blimp for $150

The interior, decorated in blue and yellow, is seen above. The pad includes a sofa which folds down into a bed for guests

The interior of the blimp is seen above. There's room for the sofa bed and chairs for guests to chill

Reservations begin October 15 and can be booked for October 22, 23 and 24 before the blimp will take flight for the University of Michigan and Notre Dame University game on October 26

This once in a lifetime experience can be booked for October 22, 23 and 24, before it takes flight for the rivalry game between the University of Michigan and Notre Dame University in Ann Arbor on October 26.

Fans lucky enough to land this Airbnb will receive tickets to the football game and official gear.

The 246 foot long blimp will be stationed at a Mogadore, Ohio, hanger 'large enough to field a 99-yard pass.'

It is equipped with a cozy sitting room with modern decor, one bedroom, one sofa bed and a private bathroom.

The unique space will also include breakfast, a television and WiFi for fans hoping to catch any pregame buzz.

Chief pilot Jerry Hissem told USA Today : 'They will have a tour of our facilities, highlighting our 100 year history and 60+ years of covering college football games. They will get to enjoy Wingfoot Lake and the complete tailgate experience. And, they will get to meet many of our crew and learn about the blimp.'

While the inside has yellow and blue furniture designed for a comfortable evening, additional space outside the blimp allows up to four people to relax on a turf inspired rug.

In the 'football lounge', visitors can watch historical college football rivalry games while sitting right next to a lakefront spot.

A grill, fire pit, cornhole and other classic tailgate games will also be available to give fans the real college football game feel.

The 'football lounge' (pictured) located outside the blimp includes a television that plays historical college football rivalry games, class tailgate games and additional space for up to four people

The new promotion is meant to honor the 150th anniversary of college football and celebrate Goodyear Blimp's upcoming induction to the College Football Hall of Fame

The Goodyear Blimp began flying over college football games and giving aerial coverage in 1955.

It has flown over 2,000 sporting and entertainment events, causing the blimp to become a welcomed sight for fans across the nation.

Goodyear has built more than 200 blimps, including the three current airships.
description: Goodyear Blimp is partnering with Airbnb to allow a few lucky college football fans to stay overnight in the legendary blimp for $150 to celebrate college footballs 150th anniversary
